model_answer: The correct answer is A: [00:05:04 - 00:06:22]. The video segment described in the question occurs between 00:05:04 and 00:06:22 and includes instructions for connecting an AC unit to a manifold gauge set and a 410A tank, as well as priming the hose and monitoring compressor amps. The narrator also emphasizes the use of a scale and provides guidance on how to properly operate the system.
The screen displays the message “TALK TEMPERATURES NOT Pressures” at [00:03:26 - 00:03:40].
